it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.powerups

Class TagbackController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.controller.powerups.TagbackController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PowerupController

    public class TagbackController
extends Object
implements PowerupController
    Controller for the powerup effect PowerupEnum.TAGBACK.

    A player may ues this during another player's turn, when he gets damaged by that player. The player of the turn will get a mark from the player using the powerup.

    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini

        public TagbackController(Match match)

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • use

        public boolean use(PersistentView view)
        Makes the player associated to given view use this powerup.

        If the players who uses this powerup has received no damage during the current turn, he can't use the powerup so he'll be notified and the method returns false.

        If he has been damaged, then a mark will be given to the current player, with no additional action required for the user of the powerup, and the method returns true.

        Specified by:
        use in interface PowerupController
        Parameters:
        view - The view of the player who uses the powerup, not null
        Returns:
        true if the powerup has been used, false if it hasn't been used
